sentences.cn: 一切疑虑现在都烟消云散了.

sentences.en: All of the energy converted is dissipated within the source.
sentences.cn: 转换来的所有能量都耗散在电源内部.
不要过沉迷于酒色的生活.

sentences.en: Flynn was still handsome, though dissipated.
sentences.cn: 尽管放荡无度，弗林英俊样貌并未有什么变化。

sentences.en: He dissipated the family fortune in only a few years of wild living.
sentences.cn: 他仅仅几年的放荡生活就把家产挥霍尽了.

sentences.en: He often dissipated his energies in trivial matters.
sentences.cn: 他常在无关紧要的小事上浪费精力.
他不久便把财产挥霍光了.

sentences.en: Her son's letter dissipated all her fears and anxiety.
sentences.cn: 她儿子的来信消除了她一切恐惧和焦虑.

sentences.en: Surpluses may be dissipated by accumulating reserves or lending overseas.
sentences.cn: 顺差则可以转化为储备的积累或对海外的放款.

sentences.en: The clouds have now been dissipated.
The heat had to be dissipated by elaborate cooling systems.
sentences.cn: 热得用复杂的冷却装置散发.
这个消息驱散了我的恐惧.

sentences.en: This compression is not dissipated by agents.
sentences.cn: 这一浓缩作用不会被药剂所消除。

words.tran_cn: 消散的；沉迷于酒色的；闲游浪荡的；放荡的

trans.tran_cn: 驱散了的，分散的，浪费掉的，沉迷于酒色的
trans.tran_en: If you describe someone as dissipated, you disapprove of them because they spend a lot of time drinking alcohol and enjoying other physical pleasures, and are probably unhealthy because of this

trans.tran_cn: 驱散，消失( dissipate的过去式和过去分词 )，浪费
